description: This file handles server-side request processing for a Remix-based web application, including server rendering logic, request handling, CORS setup, and bot detection.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that processes incoming HTTP requests, differentiates between bot and browser requests, and serves server-rendered HTML content accordingly.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot user agents, returning a streamed HTML response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser user agents, returning a streamed HTML response.
